thread.title: Obama to Announce 'Robust' Senior Exec Reforms This Fall
thread.title_full: Obama to Announce 'Robust' Senior Exec Reforms This Fall

title: Obama to Announce 'Robust' Senior Exec Reforms This Fall
text:
02 Obama to Announce 'Robust' Senior Exec Reforms This Fall 
Government Executive: The White House will unveil significant reforms of the Senior Executive Service later this fall, marking one of the Obama administrationâ€™s final attempts at improving management in the federal workforce.The Obama-created White House Advisory Group on Senior Executive Service Reform recently concluded its preliminary work and issued its proposals to the Office of Management and Budget. OMB is currently fine-tuning the recommendations and will roll them out in the coming weeks.
